mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Accounts(name, surname, email, tc, type, balance, last_update, is_deleted, id, user_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{surname}, #{email}, #{tc}, #{type}, #{balance}, #{lastUpdate}, #{isDeleted}, #{number}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE accounts SET balance = #{amount} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE accounts SET last_update = #{date} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE accounts SET is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
